Text: thanks man, but can you tell me how you do it? I have a bunch of BRRips in .mkv that I would like to have as .mp4 and be able to stream them to my Xbox like this.

Thanks for the up PT
Fun movie!
Great quality!
Nice work m8!

@LMTBay:nnYou don\'t need to re-encode mkv files, since they already contain h264 video which Xboxes can play. You can use a program called Avidemux to open mkv files and then save them as mp4. I think you\'ll also need to have 2 channel audio for Xbox, just set audio to AAC and in filters set mixer to stereo.
